messages.msgSnippet: Ok, that may not be the best title, but I thought that it may still catch your eye. I did go and make sure this was ligit before forwarding, so please go and
messages.messageBody:
Ok, that may not be the best title, but I thought that it may still catch
your eye. I did go and make sure this was ligit before forwarding, so please
go and help fight against breast cancer.
Ron and Stephanie
Wild Country Rose Soaps
Life's Learnings Academy
Homeschooling 3 little ones,
and keeping them all clean!
----- Original Message -----
From: "Jean Baker" <jean.baker@...>
Sent: Tuesday, October 24, 2000 4:20 PM
Subject: [Mich_Homeschool] THIS IS TODAY!!!


> Last Sunday during the football games, the NFL aired a commercial that
they were joining the fight against breast cancer. Here's the scoop:
>
> On Tuesday, October 24, the NFL's Breast Cancer Awareness Day, the NFL
will donate $5 for every person that logs onto www.nfl.com and then clicks
on "NFL for Her." They will donate up to $50,000 to the Susan G. Komen
Breast Cancer Foundation.
>
> Please forward this to people you believe will take a quick minute to make
a difference.
>
>
> Jean
> www.babyzone.com
>
> ........................................................
> iWon.com http://www.iwon.com why wouldn't you?
> ........................................................
